de.javasoft.plaf.synthetica.painter
Class JYTabbedPanePainter

java.lang.Object
  de.javasoft.plaf.synthetica.painter.JYTabbedPanePainter

public class JYTabbedPanePainter
extends java.lang.Object

Painter for JYTabbedPane. Optional UI-properties:

  • JYTabbedPane.tabsPanel.croppedEdge.image.[leading | trailing] - String, imagePath to croppedEdge image
  • JYTabbedPane.tabsPanel.croppedEdge.image.[leading | trailing].insets - Insets, image insets

    • Version:
    1.03, 14.04.2009

    paintCroppedEdge

    public void paintCroppedEdge(javax.swing.JComponent c,
                             de.javasoft.plaf.synthetica.SyntheticaState state,
                             int placement,
                             boolean leading,
                             java.awt.Graphics g,
                             int x,
                             int y,
                             int w,
                             int h,
                             java.awt.Color background,
                             java.awt.Color foreground)
    Paints cropped edge on the tabs panel.

    Parameters:
    c - The Component
    state - Component state
    placement - Tab placement (TOP, BOTTOM, LEFT, RIGHT)
    leading - True for leading cropped edge
    g - Graphics
    x - X-position
    y - Y-position
    w - Width
    h - Height
    background - Background color
    foreground - Foreground color - line color
